text: [Chapter 21a] [Nolavillian Mountain Range, Northern Nolavillia]

speaker: left
text: They are here...

speaker: left
text: It seems there is another Xuirist camp here, but we must proceed.

speaker: left
text: Omega's been defeated, I've got to get out of here!
(Break flees!)

speaker: right
text: They're gone... they're all gone...

speaker: right
text: I've been defeated. You win, Proton.
(Omega kneels before Proton)

speaker: right
text: Kill me however you wish.

speaker: left
text: An honorable death for a Xuirist, you will be executed.
(Proton executes Omega)

speaker: right
text: We'll be reaching the Village of Binding soon, it will be the final chance for us to prepare before entering the Shadow Realm.
[Village of Binding, Nation of Nation]

speaker: left
text: We've arrived.
???: You there! Are you what I think you are!?

speaker: left
text: Huh?
???: You must be here to stop the Shadow Realm, are you?

speaker: left
text: Yes, actually.
???: Great!
???: I am Fiyghtrr, and I have been training years for this moment!

speaker: right
text: Allow me to join you on your attack on the Shadow Realm!
[Recruit Fiyghtrr?] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit

speaker: right
text: It's time!
[Fiyghtrr has joined your party]

speaker: left
text: You must be Xuirurth.

speaker: right
text: Yes.

speaker: left
text: I am Proton Xurr, you might know me as Xuirond.

speaker: right
text: Xuirond?

speaker: left
text: Yes.

speaker: left
text: Xuirventh and Xuirfth told me about it.

speaker: right
text: Why are you here?

speaker: left
text: I've come to take back the Holy Itucher from the Shadow. Realm.

speaker: right
text: So the Shadow Realm has obtained the holy weapon...

speaker: right
text: Though I just escaped, it would pain me not to help you stop them.

speaker: left
text: We'll be leaving soon, but you're free to join us.
[Xuirurth joined your party!]
[Bonus Conversation Unlocked]

speaker: left
text: So, we're finally going to get the Itucher...

speaker: left
text: I thought you would've been more excited.

speaker: right
text: I'm still processing the fact it's actually happening...

speaker: right
text: And what I'll do once I return home...

speaker: left
text: Where is your home anyways? You've never told me where you're from.

speaker: right
text: I'm from Quad, but I moved to Static after the genocide.

speaker: right
text: I haven't been to either in years, though.

speaker: left
text: You should come back to Static every once in a while. If you want, you could probably join with a good rank the army since you've helped us get the Itucher.

speaker: left
text: Probably won't be able to join the EOS though, Erif's already got the fire element covered and probably won't retire anytime soon.

speaker: right
text: Erif?

speaker: left
text: Huh, you know her?

speaker: left
text: Red hair, sword user, literally hot, won't stop talking about the Quad Genocide, has two brothers...

speaker: right
text: Yeah, I've met her before.

speaker: left
text: Hmm... that means you've got ties to multiple EOS members.

speaker: left
text: You could definitely get some promotions in the army with that.
[Wodahs and Repins leveled up!]

speaker: left
text: It's time to enter the Shadow Realm...

speaker: left
text: We'll activate the portal at the Location of Binding and enter from there.
